content:
Akhilam nyaanaaraanyittum
Daivabhayatthemikachonnum
Nyaan darshichilla-than snehatthaale
Dhaarmmikanaam yauseppaarnnu-mesan raajathvam
Mahithanmosha vibhaagichaan-vadiyaal vaaridhiye
/thaananiyaadyanmaarathinaal
/tagniyilninnum rakshitharaay
Thangkatthekkaallathukaamyam
Madhuvilumathu madhuram paaram
Daivaaraadhanaye snehippon dhanyan.

Kadaloram vazhi pokumpo-lla
Nyonyam vettitthinnum
Mathsyatthe darshi-chaarnnenaashcharyam
Vismayasahitham nilkkumpoll chintichevam nyaan
Bhoovane thammil vizhungunno-rundeemarthyarilum
/tnyaayavidhikkettheedaattha
/tjeeviyeyentinu nindippu
Kanmumpil vidhi kandaalum
Parane vizhungum marthyanmaar
Kuttakkaaravare-yelkkunnon dhanyan.

Aardratha thonnaname naathhaa
Ikkarmmam kaikkollllaname
Mochanavum krpayum vaazhvum
Ninnarayinnekeedaname.

Vrtthikallaal kartthaave! Nyaan
Nin kopatthinu paathramathaayu
Karunaabdhe! Nee kopikkaa
Susthhirame nin nirmmalatha.

Nibivaakyam pol janamellaam
Jalabindukkallkkoppamathaam
nairmmalyatthe bhajnyikkaan
Thinmaykkengane saadhikkum.

Praarththhana kettidunnone
Yaachana nalkidunnone!
Praarththhanayil preethyaasadayam
Yaachanaye nalkeedaname.
